thread.section_title: TerraTrike Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TerraTrike | www.terratrike.com
thread.title: Michael R Vest :
thread.title_full: TerraTrike reviewed by Michael R Vest :

author: Michael R Vest :
title: Michael R Vest :
text: TerraTrike always provide fast service and Parts when needed, Since I live 10 hours away from where I purchased Trikes when I need parts or have a question on how to do service I can find answers on website or they willingly answer my questions on phone. Great Company and product.
